K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-1: dakshi n'i pa ri sho dh'a ni na ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-3: yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-8: na ma: sa manta pra bh'a r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-11: samyaksam buddha ya; na mo mnydzu shri ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-12: ku ma ra bhu t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-15: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128a-17: aom ni r'a la mbe ni r'a bha se dza ye dza ye la dhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128b-0: mah'a ma @128b te dakshe dakshe ni me ba ri sho dha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128b-1: 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128b-2: yon mang po la sbyad pa'ang byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128b-3: yon bdag de'i yon yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128b-4: 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo; ;'dul ba lung las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-009:128b-5: rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
